name: Planets Wars
description:
In year 2530 first Planet Wars happened. That disaster would be remembered for eternity of human kind. Every planet in the solar system fought for resources between each other. Everybody tried to keep their planet safe and alive as long as they could. Play as a rocket pilot from earth and fight other planets in order to save your planet. Every time you die your planet would be under attack, try to stay alive as long as possible and destroy your enemies.

Submission for Ludum dare.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Accelerate

LMB(Left mouse click) - Attack

It was fun and it was hard but in the end we did it!

Please leave a feedback :D

Music by Tim Beek
